raw_data.name: Cosmic Hearth Games
raw_data.address: 354 George W Liles Pkwy Suite 60, Concord, NC 28027

posts.body: Cosmic Hearth Games is Now Open!

reviews_data.review_text: I’ve been coming here consistently since the grand opening a little over a month ago and from the moment I walked in, I was welcomed with the warmth and acceptance of an awesome family. The owner James is extremely involved in ensuring the experience of visitors is comfortable. The games are fun, new player friendly. I started playing magic here with the help of the community. The dnd community is still building as well! My friends and I are making a routine of being here 💕
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for keeping the vibes strong at the Hearth Jolie!

reviews_data.review_text:
Went in for a Sorcery Contested Realm event today, and stayed for the Avatar MTG prerelease!!!
10/10 people and space
Vibes are unmatched, join the discord and you’ll find someone to play whatever you want to play.  James is a welcoming host and will make sure your experience is the best it can be.

I got to stop by and visit this wonderful store (even though it's on the other side of town from me) and had a great time! I would 100% visit again, even with a long drive :)

They've cultivated a great space with wonderful people and a truly mind-boggling selection of card games. There's nothing else like it in Charlotte!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hopefully that collection will continue to grow! Thanks for the awesome review.

reviews_data.review_text:
Cosmic Hearth Games is an absolute gem of a hobby store! The atmosphere is warm, welcoming, and full of great energy. The décor is fun and inviting, and the store layout makes it easy to browse or sit down for a game.
James, the owner, is incredibly pleasant and knowledgeable. He’s always happy to help and clearly cares about every customer who walks through the door. The location is great, and the selection of TCGs is top-notch, from Magic and Pokémon to lots of other newer or niche games.
Cosmic Hearth Games truly lives up to its name.
Highly recommended!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the review! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the atmosphere it’s our ultimate goal in creating a third space for folks.

reviews_data.review_text: Luscious spread of packs to rip.  You like Sports? Got it! You like TCGs? Got it!  Boosters, Looseys, WNBA, Events, Customer service this place has it all.  Cosmic Hearth? Should be called Cosmic “Birth” because this is where it all begins!

A fantastic new game store for a thriving community! Went to a Star Wars Unlimited pre-release last night, and the place was packed. Tons of product, tons of fun, an awesome loyalty perks system, and they’re only just beginning. Can’t wait to see where this place goes!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the awesome review! The prerelease was such a blast — it really showed what this community can be. I’m so glad you had fun and appreciate you noticing all the little things we’re building. Can’t wait to have you back at the Hearth for more games soon! 🔥
